problem_names:
lemma tauPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "\<tau>.(P) \<simeq> \<tau>.(Q)"

lemma outputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "a{b}.P \<simeq> a{b}.Q"

lemma inputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   x :: name

  assumes PSimQ: "\<forall>y. P[x::=y] \<simeq> Q[x::=y]"
  
  shows "a<x>.P \<simeq> a<x>.Q"

lemma matchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "[a\<frown>b]P \<simeq> [a\<frown>b]Q"

lemma mismatchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "[a\<noteq>b]P \<simeq> [a\<noteq>b]Q"

lemma sumPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<oplus> R \<simeq> Q \<oplus> R"

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R"

lemma resPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name

  assumes PeqQ: "P \<simeq> Q"
  
  shows "<\<nu>x>P \<simeq> <\<nu>x>Q"

lemma congruenceBang:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "!P \<simeq> !Q"
translations:
lemma tauPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "\<tau>.(P) \<simeq> \<tau>.(Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<tau>.P \<simeq> \<tau>.Q
by(blast intro: unfoldI Weak_Late_Step_Sim_Pres.tauPres dest: congruenceWeakBisim symetric)

lemma outputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "a{b}.P \<simeq> a{b}.Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a{b}.P \<simeq> a{b}.Q
by(blast intro: unfoldI Weak_Late_Step_Sim_Pres.outputPres dest: congruenceWeakBisim symetric)

lemma inputPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   x :: name

  assumes PSimQ: "\<forall>y. P[x::=y] \<simeq> Q[x::=y]"
  
  shows "a<x>.P \<simeq> a<x>.Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>y. P[x::=y] \<simeq> Q[x::=y]

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a<x>.P \<simeq> a<x>.Q

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>y. P[x::=y] \<simeq> Q[x::=y] \<Longrightarrow>
    a<x>.P \<leadsto><weakBisim> a<x>.Q
 2. \<forall>y. P[x::=y] \<simeq> Q[x::=y] \<Longrightarrow>
    a<x>.Q \<leadsto><weakBisim> a<x>.P

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>y. P[x::=y] \<simeq> Q[x::=y] \<Longrightarrow>
    a<x>.Q \<leadsto><weakBisim> a<x>.P
by(rule_tac Weak_Late_Step_Sim_Pres.inputPres, auto intro: congruenceWeakBisim Weak_Late_Bisim.symmetric)

lemma matchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "[a\<frown>b]P \<simeq> [a\<frown>b]Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [a\<frown>b]P \<simeq> [a\<frown>b]Q
by(blast intro: unfoldI Weak_Late_Step_Sim_Pres.matchPres dest: unfoldE symetric)

lemma mismatchPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   a :: name
  and   b :: name

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "[a\<noteq>b]P \<simeq> [a\<noteq>b]Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. [a\<noteq>b]P \<simeq> [a\<noteq>b]Q
by(blast intro: unfoldI Weak_Late_Step_Sim_Pres.mismatchPres dest: unfoldE symetric)

lemma sumPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<oplus> R \<simeq> Q \<oplus> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> R \<simeq> Q \<oplus> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> R \<simeq> Q \<oplus> R
by(blast intro: Weak_Late_Bisim.reflexive unfoldI Weak_Late_Step_Sim_Pres.sumPres dest: unfoldE symetric)

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi

  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R
have "\<And>P Q R. \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel> R \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<parallel> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         R \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         R \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         R \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q
  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q R.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P \<parallel>
                         R \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<parallel> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q
  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<parallel> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q
  P \<approx> Q
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  ?P \<parallel> ?R \<approx> ?Q \<parallel> ?R
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>?x>?P \<approx> <\<nu>?x>?Q
  ?P \<approx> ?P
  eqvt weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
this:
  P \<parallel> R \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<parallel> R

goal:
No subgoals!

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?Q; ?P \<approx> ?Q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<parallel>
                    ?R \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?Q \<parallel> ?R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q
  \<lbrakk>?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?Q; ?P \<approx> ?Q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<parallel>
                    ?R \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?Q \<parallel> ?R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R
by(blast intro: unfoldI dest: congruenceWeakBisim unfoldE symetric)

proof (state)
this:
  P \<parallel> R \<simeq> Q \<parallel> R

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma resPres:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   x :: name

  assumes PeqQ: "P \<simeq> Q"
  
  shows "<\<nu>x>P \<simeq> <\<nu>x>Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x.
       P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x.
       P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x.
       P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q x.
       P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  eqvt weakBisim
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>?x>?P \<approx> <\<nu>?x>?Q
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  eqvt weakBisim
  ?P \<approx> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>?x>?P \<approx> <\<nu>?x>?Q
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. <\<nu>x>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> <\<nu>x>Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q
  ?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  <\<nu>?x>?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> <\<nu>?x>?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. <\<nu>x>P \<simeq> <\<nu>x>Q
by(blast intro: unfoldI dest: congruenceWeakBisim unfoldE symetric)

lemma congruenceBang:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<simeq> Q"

  shows "!P \<simeq> !Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<simeq> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<simeq> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !Q

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<simeq> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<simeq> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q
  P \<simeq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisim> !Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q
  P \<simeq> Q
  ?P \<simeq> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?Q
  ?P \<simeq> ?Q \<Longrightarrow> ?P \<approx> ?Q
  eqvt weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisim> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisim> !Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<simeq> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisim> !Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<simeq> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !Q

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bangRel weakBisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> bangRel weakBisim \<Longrightarrow> a \<approx> b

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> bangRel weakBisim \<Longrightarrow> a \<approx> b

proof (state)
this:
  (a, b) \<in> bangRel weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b.
       (a, b) \<in> bangRel weakBisim \<Longrightarrow> a \<approx> b

proof (prove)
using this:
  (a, b) \<in> bangRel weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<approx> b

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q. P \<approx> Q \<Longrightarrow> !P \<approx> !Q
 2. \<And>R T P Q.
       \<lbrakk>R \<approx> T; (P, Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisim;
        P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> R \<parallel> P \<approx> T \<parallel> Q
 3. \<And>P Q a.
       \<lbrakk>(P, Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisim; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>a>P \<approx> <\<nu>a>Q

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>R T P Q.
       \<lbrakk>R \<approx> T; (P, Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisim;
        P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> R \<parallel> P \<approx> T \<parallel> Q
 2. \<And>P Q a.
       \<lbrakk>(P, Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisim; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>a>P \<approx> <\<nu>a>Q
apply (metis Weak_Late_Bisim.reflexive Weak_Late_Bisim.symmetric Weak_Late_Bisim.transitive Weak_Late_Bisim_Pres.parPres Weak_Late_Bisim_SC.parSym)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q a.
       \<lbrakk>(P, Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisim; P \<approx> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> <\<nu>a>P \<approx> <\<nu>a>Q

proof (state)
this:
  a \<approx> b

goal:
No subgoals!

proof (state)
this:
  bangRel weakBisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<lbrakk>P \<leadsto><weakBisim> Q; P \<simeq> Q\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> !P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisim> !Q
  bangRel weakBisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

proof (prove)
using this:
  !P \<leadsto><bangRel weakBisim> !Q
  bangRel weakBisim \<subseteq> weakBisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<simeq> Q
  \<lbrakk>?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> ?Q; ?P \<simeq> ?Q\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> !?P \<leadsto><weakBisim> !?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<simeq> !Q
by(blast intro: unfoldI dest: unfoldE symetric congruenceWeakBisim)
